info.title: E-commerce API
info.description: Complete API for online store operations including product catalog, shopping cart, checkout, and user management.

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT token.

get.description: Retrieve all addresses for authenticated user.

post.description: Add new address to user's address book.

get.description: Search and filter products with pagination.
Retrieve detailed product information including variants.
Retrieve current cart with items and totals.

post.description: Add product variant to shopping cart.
Initialize checkout process with shipping and billing information.

get.description: Retrieve order history for authenticated user.
